channel.title: Newsletter on Seasalt.ai - Anyone, Anywhere. Natural, Personalized, and Actionable Conversations with Customers
channel.description: Recent content in Newsletter on Seasalt.ai - Anyone, Anywhere. Natural, Personalized, and Actionable Conversations with Customers

item.title: What Does Seasalt.ai Really Do?
item.description:
Hi there!

My name is Amy, and I am here to answer the not-so-obvious question: what does Seasalt.ai do?

item.title: Sub Topic Summaries for Google Meet; Speech Recognition for Dutch English Accent
item.description:
In this edition:

  1. [Product] Google Meet Gets More Focused Summaries with Sub-Topics!
  2. [Product] SeaVoice Nails Dutch English Accent on Discord Speech Recognition

Google Meet Gets More Focused Summaries with Sub-Topics!

When a meeting gets very long, the summaries get long too. Distracted in browsing the summaries? We solved it by adding a topic prefix to each summary, for instance, â€œSeattle Trip: Amy talks about her recent trip to Seattle and shares details about the places she visited and the food she ate.â€ Give SeaMeet a try for all your transcription needs today!

item.title: SeaVoice Speech-to-Text Accuracy; Generative AI Chatbots with SeaChat
item.description:
In this edition:

  1. [Product] SeaVoice Speech-to-Text Accuracy Improvements
  2. [Product] Generative AI Chatbots with SeaChat

SeaVoice Speech-to-Text Accuracy Reaches New Accuracy Milestones

The SeaVoice Speech-to-Text engine has recently broken through to new heights, placing in the top three when compared to a variety of STT systems from companies like Azure and Google, and outperforming Google Chirp. Give SeaVoice a try for all your transcription needs today!

item.title: SeaX Voicemail; SeaVoice on Bias Breakers; New SeaX Messaging Notifications
item.description:
In this edition:

  1. [Product] SeaX Introduces Voicemail Automations
  2. [Highlight] Seasalt.ai Partners with Bias Breakers Podcast
  3. [Product] New Notification Features in SeaX Messaging

SeaX Introduces Voicemail Automations

The SeaX Contact Center can now handle customer voicemails! When a customer is not able to get through to an agent, the SeaX Contact Center will record their voicemail and assign it as a task to the next available agent, ensuring that customers get the fastest possible callback and donâ€™t have to wait in long hold lines. The platform can also automatically notify a supervisor when new voicemails come into the system.

item.title: Discord Bot New Languages; SeaX Messaging Click Tracking; SeaX-HubSpot Integration
item.description:
In this edition:

  1. [Product] SeaVoice Discord Bot Supports New Languages
  2. [Product] SeaX Messaging Introduces Click Tracking
  3. [Product] Auto Sync Call Records from SeaX to HubSpot

SeaVoice Discord Bot Supports New Languages

We are excited to announce that we have added 10 new languages to our speech-to-text support for the SeaVoice Discord bot! When you use the /recognize command, you can now select from the following languages:

item.title: CoPilot for Google Meet; SeaVoice Discord Bot Tutorial; ChatGPT Contact Centers
item.description:
In this edition:

  1. [Product] SeaMeet is your CoPilot for Google Meet
  2. [Highlight] Refreshed Video Tutorial for SeaVoice Discord STT/TTS Bot
  3. [Webinar] ChatGPT-Powered Contact Centers: Transforming Customer Support in the Digital Age

SeaMeet is your CoPilot for Google Meet (available for English/Chinese)

We released SeaMeet on Google Workspace Marketplace! It transcribes your meeting, extracts topics, todo actions, and summarizes in real-time. It is available for both English and Chinese. Early testers get free access. Please drop us a line if you are interested!

item.title: SeaVoice Nails Code Switching; Discord Server Boosting; ChatGPT Ecommerce Bot
item.description:
In this edition:

  1. [Highlight] SeaVoice Nails Code Switching in Automatic Speech Recognition
  2. [Product] Discord - Your server has been boosted!
  3. [Product] ChatGPT Powered Upsell Ecommerce Bot

SeaVoice Nails Code Switching in Automatic Speech Recognition

Seasalt.aiâ€™s speech team has been working hard (notice the 12:18AM timestamp? ðŸ¤£) on introducing multilingual speech recognition capabilities in our service! Native speakers of one language (such as Chinese) sometimes heavily mix another language (English) in their speech. It is a difficult task because the other language is often spoken by non-native speakers.

item.title: WhatsApp Auto Reply; Leveraging GPT for CX; Insights from United CX
item.description:
In this edition:

  1. [Product] SeaX Contact Center Adds Auto Reply for WhatsApp
  2. [Webinar] Seasalt.ai CEO Xuchen Yao Talks Leveraging GPT for More Effective Customer Service
  3. [Highlight] Customer Service at United Airlines: the Good, the Bad and the Ugly

SeaX Contact Center Adds Auto Reply for WhatsApp

We are excited to introduce new features for the WhatsApp channel in the SeaX Contact Center. You can now set up keywords and automatic replies to handle the simple conversations and frequently asked questions that your customers message you about. A lightweight solution for automating your messaging flow when you donâ€™t need a complicated IVR!

item.title: SeaVoice Discord Bot Helps Moderators;Segment your Customers in Bulk Messaging Outreach
item.description:
In this edition:

  1. [Product] SeaVoice STT/TTS Discord Bot gives Moderators More Control over Voice Channel
  2. [Product] Segment Your Customers in Bulk Messaging with Labels

SeaVoice STT/TTS Discord Bot gives Moderators More Control over Voice Channel

The SeaVoice Discord bot introduces two exciting new commands to tailor its use to your preference!

item.title: Discord TTS Case Study;Chinese Support for Discord Bot;NearMe Push Messages
item.description:
In this edition:

  1. [Product] Text-to-Speech Discord Bot Case Study
  2. [Product] SeaVoice Discord Bot Supports Chinese
  3. [Highlight] Capture Users After They Leave Webchats with Near Me Messaging

Text-to-Speech Discord Bot Case Study

Our SeaVoice Discord bot has now been added to nearly 800 servers, and is used daily to provide STT and TTS to Discord users. Discord users are loving the speech-to-text function in a number of situations, including:

item.title: Twilio/Seasalt.ai go to APJ; UnTechCon on Discord; Auto Dialer
item.description:
In this edition:

  1. [News] Seasalt.ai and Twilio Release SeaX to APJ
  2. [Conference] UnTechCon Transcribes Large Discord Audio Channels with SeaVoice
  3. [Product] SeaX Highlight â€“ Auto Dialer

Seasalt.ai and Twilio Release SeaX to APJ

Seasalt.ai and Twilio have officially expanded our partnership to Asia Pacific and Japan, bringing SeaX to customers in the APJ region. The SeaX Quick Start Bundle enables us to launch an out of the box contact center in days, while still allowing for customization, to give customers the contact center they need when they need it.
